programme.title: Cry Blood Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: An Apache brave seeks vengeance on a band of sadistic gold hunters in this bloody drive-in western. Pitcalin (Jody McRae) leads the marauders who wipe out an Apache camp when they discover gold, only to watch their violent deeds lead to their own demise. Featuring a superb cast that also includes Dan Kemp, Robert Tessier, and Joel McRae, this coldblooded western tale was directed by character actor and filmmaker Jack Starrett (Cleopatra Jones, The Losers).

programme.title: Kentucky Rifle
programme.desc: His Wits, Weapons and Women, Turned Defeat Into Victory! A man brings a wagonload of Kentucky rifles through Indian Territory. Unfortunately the Indians realize what he has and offer the travelers an ultimatum: the rifles or their lives! Starring Lance Fuller, Sterling Holloway, Henry Hull, Chill Wills, Cathy Downs, and Jeanne Cagney, plus one of the great B-Western heels, I. Stanford Jolley!

programme.title: Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western about a man avenging the murder of his parents. Other cast members include frequent Wayne sidekick George 'Gabby Hayes', plus Yakima Canutt, Sheila Terry, and Jack Rockwell. This Paul Malvern Production from director Robert N. Bradbury also features Earl Dwire, one of the great B-movie villains, as Zanti, the ruthless bandit who sets the action in motion.

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboy's beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Riders of the Deadline
programme.desc: The 50th of 66 Hopalong Cassidy films finds Hoppy in a vengeful mood. When his good friend Tim Mason is unjustly sent to jail and then killed when trying to escape, Hoppys bitterness gets him drummed out of the Texas Rangers. With the help of his pals California Carson and Jimmy Rogers, he sets out to expose the real culprits and clear Tims name. The usual cast is here, including William Boyd as Hoppy, plus Andy Clyde, Jimmy Rogers, and in one of his earliest roles, Robert Mitchum.

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers' next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isn't fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not it's up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: The Fighting Redhead
programme.desc: When a rustler named Faro kills one of his own henchmen and blames it on Sheila O'Conner, Red and Little Beaver set out to clear Sheila and to find evidence against Faro and his gang.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Call of the Forest
programme.desc: There's plenty of drama in this tale of lost gold mines, gallant stallions, and fuzzy bears. Starring Ken Curtis, Robert Lowery, and Chief Thundercloud, this charming little film is highlighted by Karl Struss' stunning photography

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhoun's watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, the G-Men are sent to the Ozarks to track down gold stolen from the U.S. Government. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: An outlaw gang is stealing gold from Chinese placer miners, then driving off their claims with outrageous taxes. Because they're Chinese, they can't sue the local government agents. With Stoney posing as a Chinese miner and Pat pretending to be a representative of an Eastern engineering company, the U.S. government tries to bring an end to the careers of the outlaw gang and crooked state government agents.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark goes undercover working at a gambling den. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955. Also starring Dick SImmons, Claire Carleton, Mauritz Hugo, Howard Wright, and Douglas Evans.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is shot during a robbery. Her life becomes in danger when her doctor is kidnapped by the murderous outlaw Clay Allison.Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Jack Kelly, Paul Farber, Frank Fenton, and Fred Sherman.Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Sharon Bender intends to marry Adam over the objections of wealthy father Dan. When Dan's killing is announced, Adam is jailed and a lynch mob forms. The Judge and Taggart have their doubts wondering if a murder even occurred. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: While attempting to steal land from an Indian tribe, crooked ranchers kill one of the braves. The Judge must move fast to prevent an all-out massacre. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: George Washington helps a young woman whose land is being threatened by an innkeeper. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper .Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: A group of wives living on the frontier aim to join their husbands for the holidays.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by Jams Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Farmer Perkins murders a store clerk in front of his wife, and is allowed to walk after his trial, the Cartwright's step in to make sure he'll be rearrested, tried, and hung.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Man from Music Mountain
programme.desc: Gene Autry stops singing long enough to take on some nasty land developers in this oldtime western from Republic Pictures. Of course, it wouldnt be a Gene Autry movie if there werent at least a few songs, and this one comes packed with such numbers as Im Beginning to Care, Love, Burning Love, and the title song. Genes longtime sidekick Smiley Burnette gets to sing a few, too, including She Works Third Tub at the Laundry.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you won't want to miss!

programme.title: Hands Across The Border
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger star in this Republic Pictures western about horse breeders vying for a contract with the U.S. Army. The cast also includes such favorites as Onslow Stevens and Guinn Big Boy Williams, while songs include Hey Hey (It's a Great Day), Dreaming to Music, and The Girl with the High Button Shoes. For movie buffs: The music for the title song, Hands Across the Border, was composed by none other than Hoagy Carmichael!

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her father's honor after he's killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol' Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TV's future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppy's adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywood's greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: Land of Hunted Men
programme.desc: A band of outlaws is terrorizing a town in the West. Leave it to Ray Crash Corrigan and his Range Busters to ride in and save the day. This film marked the return of Corrigan to the famous series; he had appeared in the first sixteen movies but left for a brief hiatus following 1942's ARIZONA STAGECOACH. This was the 21st of 24 movies in the Range Busters series. Produced between 1940-1943, the Range Busters were a huge financial success for Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. It's all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A cavalry officer sympathetic to the wronged Sioux tribe fixes a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant but a dishonest Indian Agent and a hateful General Custer test the Sioux's patience, threatening to derail the peace-talks. Directed and co-written by Sidney Salkow; starring Dale Robertson, Mary Murphy, J. Carrol Naish. Also, look for legendary character actor Iron Eyes Cody as Crazy Horse.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney take time out from their duties to try and collect the bounty posted on a legendary golden wolf that roams the Colorado foothills. A couple of wolf hunters don't take kindly to a pair of amateur hunters horning in on their range and attempt to drive the G-Men away before they can capture or kill their quarry.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney travel to Wyoming to oversee a land opening and end up playing nursemaid to a pair of identical twin pranksters and a kooky Chinese cook. Meanwhile, a trio of outlaws are pursuing the twins seeking information they possess. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joe's hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho must prove their innocence when they are accused of killing the assistant to the sheriff in Bonanza.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 .This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco tries to help a beautiful woman prove that her brother is innocent after he's arrested for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A railroad detective pursues the infamous female outlaw, Belle Starr, after a herd of horses are stolen from the U.S. Calvalry. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Belle Starr is played by Mary Windsor. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A railroad detective pursues the infamous female outlaw, Belle Starr, after a herd of horses are stolen from the U.S. Calvalry. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Belle Starr is played by Mary Windsor. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In Family Ties, Judge Bean comes to the aid of the Peralta family as unscrupulous real estate agents try to force them off their land. They've learned that a railroad will need the property and they intend to make an undeserved profit. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, crooks posing as newspapermen attempt to blackmail a local rancher in order to steal his land and property. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie faces off against dangerous twin sisters, Dana and Jana Matthews. Annie is fast with a gun, but is she fast enough to take on a duo known as The Trigger Twins? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the towns doctor is unable to save his own father, he loses confidence in his work. Annie tries to convince him that Diablo needs him. Can Annie help him reclaim his confidence? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tensions rise between the settlers and the Ottawas. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye becomes embroiled in a fortune hunter's search for treasure. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild.Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: Sunset Carson is trying to raise money for a new school and his partner Sam Webster is out to stop him. When Carson plans a benefit prize-fight, Webster plans to make off with the proceeds. Direted by Oliver Drake; starring Sunset Carson, Al Terry, Pat Starling, Ron Ormond, Joe Hiser.

programme.title: Public Cowboy No. 1
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Smiley Burnette are back, and this time theyre dealing with some very modern thinking rustlers. These new criminals have taken up the latest technologies to outsmart the authorities, including shortwave radios and airplanes! Can Gene and Smiley get em? You bet! Songs include The West Aint What It Used To Be, I Got the HeebieJeebie Blues, and The Defective Detective from Brooklyn. Gene also gets romantic when he sings, I Picked up the Trail when I Found You...

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos
programme.desc: Roy Rogers finds himself elected sheriff in a wild Texas town after the Civil War. But can Roy handle a place under martial law? And can he save Gabby Hayes from being executed? And how many songs will he get to sing? Clear the burrs from your saddle and get ready for a good one, also starring Marjorie Reynolds, plus Sally Payne as Belle Starr, Queen of the Oklahoma Outlaws!

programme.title: Jesse James Rides Again
programme.desc: The outlaw Jesse James and his friend are on the run from the law when he is wrongly accused of leading the historic 1876 Northfield, Minnesota bank robbery. With nerve-tensing turns and high-impact action, Jesse rides into a town where a gang is trying to drive area ranchers off their land because there's oil underneath it. Jesse James takes particular interest in the situation of a pretty young woman and her elderly father, whose ranch is being regularly attacked by the gang.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Ted Hayden, a tough hombre who goes undercover to join a gang led by a heartless fiend known only as Mr. Gentry (Lloyd Whitlock). Gentry is out to take over a ranch belonging to one of Hayden's friends, but as Hayden finds out, Gentry has a lot more than that up his sleeve. You'll have to watch this two-fisted Western to find out the rest!

programme.title: Benek Brawura i czerwone taksówki
programme.desc: Dziesięcioletni Benek postanawia uratować swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, taksówkarza Dussiflarda, kiedy ten wdaje się w mafijne porachunki.

programme.title: Clerks II
programme.desc: Porażka sklepów Dantego i Randalla zmusza ich do szukania nowych rozwiązań, ale ostatecznie decydują się na sieć Mooby's, fikcyjne imperium fast foodów w stylu Disneya i McDonalda. To kontynuacja losów bohaterów filmu Kevina Smitha z 1994 roku.

programme.title: Zostań
programme.desc: Pacjent ze skłonnościami samobójczymi głosi dziwaczne przepowiednie, które – ku rosnącemu przerażeniu jego psychiatry – zaczynają się spełniać. Lekarz rozpoczyna wyścig z czasem, aby uratować to, co kocha, zanim wszystko zniknie.

programme.title: Where's the Money?
programme.desc: W tej skandalicznie śmiesznej komedii Del, sprytny młodzieniec wychowany na ulicach South Central Los Angeles, dowiaduje się, że jego osadzony ojciec wraz z wujkiem, który właśnie wyszedł na wolność (Terry Crews), ukradli milion dolarów i pieniądze ukryli w piwnicy noclegowni.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Bodom
programme.desc: Czwórka nastolatków wybiera się nad jezioro Bodom, by odtworzyć scenę brutalnego morderstwa sprzed lat.

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Dziewczynka ocalała po trzęsieniu ziemi opuszcza rodzinę, która myśli, że nie udało jej się przeżyć.

programme.title: Wielkie kino
programme.desc: Historia skupia się na czterech nie-tak-młodych sierotach: pierwsza - wychowana przez kuratora w Luwrze (gdzie czai się zabójca albinosów); druga - uchodźca meksykańskiej „lucha libre”; trzecia - niedawna ofiara węży w samolocie; a czwarta - „normalny” mieszkaniec zmutowanej społeczności „X”.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Thriller Science Ficition to skok w inny wymiar. JUMPER to opowieść o niezwykłych przygodach człowieka, który odkrywa, że ma ekscytującą zdolność teleportowania się, gdziekolwiek tylko zechce.

programme.title: Niedokończony interes
programme.desc: Ciężko pracujący właściciel małego przedsiębiorstwa oraz jego dwóch wspólników podróżują do Europy, aby dobić targu ich życia. Jednak zwykła podróż służbowa przeradza się w coś zupełnie niewyobrażalnego…

programme.title: Fantastyczny Pan Lis
programme.desc: Pan i Pani Lis prowadzą szczęśliwe życie ze swoim ekscentrycznym synem Ashem. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy Pan Lis knuje intrygę by dokonać największej kradzieży kurczaków jaką widział zwierzęcy świat.

programme.title: Operacja: Zemsta
programme.desc: Kiedy były żołnierz dowiaduje się o śmierci swojego najlepszego przyjaciela, postanawia dotrzeć do prawdy i wymierzyć sprawiedliwość winnym. stanowi jedynie część wielkiego spisku. Teraz będzie musiał po kolei eliminować sprawców.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: Clerks II
programme.desc: Porażka sklepów Dantego i Randalla zmusza ich do szukania nowych rozwiązań, ale ostatecznie decydują się na sieć Mooby's, fikcyjne imperium fast foodów w stylu Disneya i McDonalda. To kontynuacja losów bohaterów filmu Kevina Smitha z 1994 roku.

programme.title: Do diabła z miłością
programme.desc: Gdy niepoprawny kobieciarz i bawidamek, dziennikarz piszący do czasopisma dla mężczyzn spotyka autorkę o feministycznych poglądach i własnych tajemnych planach, rozpoczyna się klasyczne starcie płci, zmierzające nieuchronnie do szczęśliwego finału.

programme.title: Zostań
programme.desc: Pacjent ze skłonnościami samobójczymi głosi dziwaczne przepowiednie, które – ku rosnącemu przerażeniu jego psychiatry – zaczynają się spełniać. Lekarz rozpoczyna wyścig z czasem, aby uratować to, co kocha, zanim wszystko zniknie.

programme.title: Król niewiernych
programme.desc: Młody chłopak chce ocalić swoje państwo przed okrutnymi najeźdźcami.

programme.title: Wielkie kino
programme.desc: Historia skupia się na czterech nie-tak-młodych sierotach: pierwsza - wychowana przez kuratora w Luwrze (gdzie czai się zabójca albinosów); druga - uchodźca meksykańskiej „lucha libre”; trzecia - niedawna ofiara węży w samolocie; a czwarta - „normalny” mieszkaniec zmutowanej społeczności „X”.

programme.title: W zasięgu strzału
programme.desc: Liberty, żona producenta broni, zostaje porwana przez mężczyznę imieniem Joe. Celem Joego jest pomścić córkę, która zginęła w strzelaninie w szkole, a za winnych tej tragedii uznaje twórców broni użytej w tym celu.

programme.title: Honor i siła
programme.desc: Do małego węgierskiego miasteczka przybywa Janos – charyzmatyczny i tajemniczy mężczyzna z wyraźnie przywódczymi aspiracjami, który z miejsca znajduje posłuch wśród dwóch młodych braci z trudnej rodziny.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: ASSASSIN'S CREED to spajająca światy opowieść o mężczyźnie, który znajduje się w centrum antycznej wojny pomiędzy dwoma potężnymi sektami – tylko poprzez wykorzystanie wspomnień swojego przodka, które znajdują się w jego DNA, jest w stanie zakończyć konflikt i domagać się swojego odkupienia.

programme.title: Czarny rycerz
programme.desc: Kiedy pracownik parku rozrywki w klimatach średniowiecznych (Martin Lawrence) zostaje magicznie przeniesiony w czasie do XIV-wiecznej Anglii, musi stawić czoła złemu królowi, śmiercionośnym zabójcom… i naprawdę kiepskiej hydraulice.

programme.title: Destrukcja: Los Angeles (Destruction: Los Angeles)
programme.desc: Siejąca śmierć eksplozja wulkanu i największe trzęsienie ziemi w Los Angeles niszczy całe miasto i dziesiątkuje jego populację. Najlepszy lokalny reporter John Benson wykorzystuje szansę, by opowiedzieć historię miasta od wewnątrz, starając się znaleźć rodzinę zagubioną w chaosie.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.

programme.title: Przekleństwo Jeremy'ego
programme.desc: Nieśmiały i słabo rozwinięty młody człowiek o niesamowitych umiejętnościach uczy się radzenia sobie z życiem w małym skorumpowanym mieście.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Co się zdarzyło w Las Vegas
programme.desc: Dwójka nieznajomych, którzy po pijanemu biorą ślub w Vegas, walczą o fortunę po tym, jak sędzia odrzuca ich wniosek o rozwód.

programme.title: Honor i siła
programme.desc: Do małego węgierskiego miasteczka przybywa Janos – charyzmatyczny i tajemniczy mężczyzna z wyraźnie przywódczymi aspiracjami, który z miejsca znajduje posłuch wśród dwóch młodych braci z trudnej rodziny.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: ASSASSIN'S CREED to spajająca światy opowieść o mężczyźnie, który znajduje się w centrum antycznej wojny pomiędzy dwoma potężnymi sektami – tylko poprzez wykorzystanie wspomnień swojego przodka, które znajdują się w jego DNA, jest w stanie zakończyć konflikt i domagać się swojego odkupienia.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: Destrukcja: Los Angeles (Destruction: Los Angeles)
programme.desc: Siejąca śmierć eksplozja wulkanu i największe trzęsienie ziemi w Los Angeles niszczy całe miasto i dziesiątkuje jego populację. Najlepszy lokalny reporter John Benson wykorzystuje szansę, by opowiedzieć historię miasta od wewnątrz, starając się znaleźć rodzinę zagubioną w chaosie.

programme.title: Sekretarka (Secretary)
programme.desc: Młoda kobieta (Maggie Gyllenhaal) zostaje wypuszczona ze szpitala psychiatrycznego i znajduje pracę jako sekretarka wymagającego prawnika (James Spader). Ich zawodowa relacja zamienia się w sadomasochistycznie seksualną.

programme.title: Angol
programme.desc: Wyjątkowo porywczy i niebezpieczny Anglik wychodzi z więzienia po latach odsiadki i wyrusza do Los Angeles, by odnaleźć człowieka, którego obwinia za śmierć córki.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.
